name: Town Club - Build a Town & Have Fun Here!
name_original: Town Club - Build a Town & Have Fun Here!
description:
Welcome to Town Club, a place full of joy and happiness! Move and make it your second warm sweet home! And don't forget to make friends here to build your town together :)

Get ready to build a heavenly dream town now, my great mayor!
Sow seeds in fertile fields, harvest and process crops, sell them to finish multiple orders, and make big big money! Keep working hard, sail to trade with various dealers, and bring bags of coins for town development. Moreover, you're supposed to run all kinds of business - cinema, bakery, restaurant, supermarket, jewelry store and etc. Make it flourish, mayor!

Features:
* Freely design and construct a unique pretty town;
* Talk fun with vivid citizens and get a deeper understanding with each other;
* Interesting and good neighbours you'll come across in this lovely town;
* Dozens of decorations and different buildings to use and construct a wonderful town, transforming a village into a city;
* An amazing combination of running natural farm and busy business together;
* Play with friends around the world and enjoy the fun of helping each other;
* Experience the thrill of maritime trade.

This farm game is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this option, just turn it off in your device's "Restrictions" menu.
